# TaskCLI Manager

Interactive command-line interface for managing your tasks.

## Installation

```bash
pip install taskcli-manager
```

## Usage

```bash
taskcli
```

This will launch an interactive menu where you can:
- ğŸ”‘ Login or Create Account
- ğŸ“‹ View your tasks
- â• Add new tasks
- âœ… Mark tasks as complete
- âœï¸ Edit tasks
- ğŸ—‘ï¸ Delete tasks
- ğŸ” Filter by priority, project, status

- ğŸŒ Syncs with TaskCLI web app
- ğŸ¨ Colorful terminal UI
